name: Back to Back
description: You take heart from the ally guarding your back.
info: Daily Martial , Stance Minor Action Personal

name: Tide of Iron
description: After each swing, you use your shield to shove your foe backward, and then you surge ahead.
info: At-Will Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Mighty Surge
description: You dig deep to find the strength you need to overcome your foes.
info: Daily Healing , Martial Minor Action Personal

name: Leaping Assault
description: You spring through your foes to rip apart an enemy with a savage swing.
info: Encounter Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Hurricane Strike
description: You swing your blade around you and the momentum carries you forward so you can do it again.
info: Daily Martial , Weapon Standard Action Close burst 1

name: Warding Steel
description: You whip your weapon up to intercept your enemies’ attacks.
info: Encounter Martial Minor Action Personal

name: Bitter Harvest
description: You smash through the pressing host to set your eyes and your weapon on your chosen foe.
info: Encounter Martial , Weapon Standard Action Close burst 1

name: Toppling Finish
description: In one smooth stroke, you topple the enemy and bring your weapon back to plunge it down into its struggling body.
info: Daily Martial , Reliable , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Battle Furor
description: When you draw upon your reserves, your fury rises and adds terrible weight to your attacks.
info: Encounter Martial , Stance Minor Action Personal

name: Slash and Kick
description: Your weapon tears through your foe, allowing you to follow up with a forceful kick to send the enemy sprawling.
info: Encounter Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Time to Die
description: You’ ve battled this enemy long enough: Putting all your strength behind the attack, you fling the foe away and then leap after it to bring the battle to a bloody close.
info: Daily Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Wild Offensive
description: Your weapon moves with astonishing speed, leaving those you strike reeling in pain.
info: Encounter Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Image of Death
description: As your enemies fall beneath your blade, you become the very image of death—a menacing presence sparking terror in all who behold you.
info: Daily Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Grim Warning
description: A vicious strike from your weapon reminds the enemy why attacking you is such a bad idea.
info: Encounter Martial , Weapon Immediate Reaction Melee weapon

name: Scattering Strike
description: After delivering a crippling strike to your foe, you reverse the weapon to clear yourself some space.
info: Daily Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Blocking Maneuver
description: Adjusting your grip, you move your weapon to intercept the attack.
info: Encounter Martial Immediate Interrupt Personal

name: Bitter Strike
description: So fierce is your attack that your enemy panics, ignoring your allies for one disastrous moment.
info: Encounter Fear , Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Shattering Blow
description: Your weapon crashes into the foe, splitting it wide and leaving it gasping as its vitality sprays the air.
info: Daily Martial , Reliable , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Brutal Momentum
description: Your attacks fall with such fury that your enemy cannot possibly defend against them all.
info: Encounter Martial , Stance Minor Action Personal

name: Spirit Beckoned
description: As you strike your foe with your blade, your spirit companion senses its weakness.
info: Encounter Primal , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Spiritspell Assault
description: You charge your blade with arcane energy, and as you strike, you focus another spell through your spirit companion.
info: Daily Arcane , Force , Primal , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: One with the Blade
description: You coax your spirit companion into your blade, making your attacks more precise.
info: Daily Primal , Spirit Minor Action Personal

name: Deepdark Strike
description: Your weapon is wreathed in an impenetrable blackness, which darkens your enemy’s eyes when you strike.
info: Encounter Arcane , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Form of the Umber Hulk
description: Your eyes take on an insectlike appearance, you sprout antennae from atop your head, and a pair of sharp mandibles grows out from your mouth. At the moment you choose, you can gaze upon your enemies and sow confusion in their ranks.
info: Daily Polymorph , Primal Minor Action Personal

name: Cursefire Light
description: Your body is ablaze in an eerie green flame that feeds off your curses, bolstering you.
info: Daily Arcane , Stance Minor Action Personal

name: Sorcerer's Fury
description: A burst of energy erupts from your blade as you plunge it into your enemy, pushing away those near it.
info: Encounter Arcane , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Arcane Overload
description: You charge your weapon with crackling arcane power. When your attack lands, the foe is awash in an explosion of withering energy, and the residual energy envelops your weapon.
info: Daily Arcane , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Resilient Denial
description: After you are hit by a particularly devastating attack, you channel your fury and attune your arcane energies to resist another such strike.
info: Daily Arcane Immediate Reaction Personal

name: Deathly Retort
description: Your soul lashes out with necrotic energy at one who would harm you.
info: Encounter Necrotic Immediate Reaction Close burst 20

name: Haunting Form
description: You adopt a ghostly form to achieve your vengeful aims.
info: Daily Minor Action Personal

name: Death Locus
description: After an initial burst of black, life-sapping energy, your body is flooded with a killing darkness that is attracted to those it initially touched.
info: Daily Necrotic Standard Action Area burst 1 within 10

name: Diamond Body
description: Your incredible speed and resilience, born from your mastery of psionic magic, allow you to shrug off a deadly attack.
info: Encounter Psionic Immediate Interrupt Personal

name: Mist Walker's Step
description: With the proper focus of your psionic power, even physical obstacles are no match for you.
info: Encounter Psionic Minor Action Personal

name: Cloud of Sparrows
description: Sparrows swirl around you, a storm of tiny talons and beaks that rends your foes and then whisks you away.
info: Encounter Implement , Primal , Teleportation Standard Action Close burst 2

name: Devouring Swarm
description: You dispatch pieces of your swarm form to drain blood from your foes to give yourself resilience.
info: Encounter Beast Form , Implement , Primal Standard Action Close blast 5

name: Hungry for the Kill
description: As you shake your enemy’s life loose, you avoid a doom waiting for you.
info: Encounter Beast Form , Healing , Implement , Primal Standard Action Melee touch

name: Spinning Sweep
description: You spin beneath your enemy’s guard with a slashing strike, and then sweep your leg through your foe an instant later, knocking it to the ground.
info: Encounter Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Stormhowler's Strike
description: Your attack summons up a storm of primal fury that draws in those that try to escape it.
info: Encounter Primal , Teleportation , Weapon , Zone Standard Action Close blast 3

name: Icewrought Armor
description: A shell of ice spreads across your ally, offering protection even as it freezes a foe that dares to strike.
info: Encounter Primal Minor Action Close burst 3

name: Acid Surge
description: You dissolve into a bubbling, hissing liquid and surge through your enemies.
info: Encounter Acid Move Action Personal

name: Firedeath
description: As all fires must burn out, so does each attack on you dwindle and die.
info: Encounter Immediate Interrupt Personal

name: Plaguebearer
description: The breath you exhale is not a bearer of seeds and scents, but a carrier of poison and death.
info: Encounter Poison Minor Action Personal

name: Void Assumption
description: You become the void, the absence of all, for just long enough.
info: Encounter Minor Action Personal

name: Abyssal Rend
description: Channeling the Abyss’s evil, your fingertips tear through your foe’s armor and flesh—more so if you can smell its blood.
info: Encounter Standard Action Melee touch

name: Abyssal Command
description: As the Abyss stains your bloodline, you corrupt another’s body and mind.
info: Daily Charm , Reliable Standard Action Melee touch

name: Demonskin Meditation
description: You wrap yourself in a sheathe of demon’s energy, protecting yourself from a variety of elements.
info: Daily Minor Action Personal

name: Glimpse of the Void
description: Your lightest touch grants the creature the true experience of being without existence.
info: Encounter Standard Action Melee touch

name: Voidsoul Infliction
description: All creatures that near you feel the fatal pull of utter dissolution.
info: Daily Psychic , Stance Minor Action Personal

name: Wearing the Void
description: You are nothing; nothing can pierce you or rend you.
info: Encounter Immediate Interrupt Personal

name: Acid Whirlpool
description: Tainted water flies out from you to strike a foe before you draw it, and your foe, back in to you.
info: Encounter Acid Standard Action Close burst 3

name: Corrosive Torrent
description: You create a rushing flow of fluid that makes the eyes water and burns the flesh.
info: Daily Acid Standard Action Close blast 5

name: Always Falling Rage
description: The fury of the waterfall and the relentless push of the waters propels you past any defenses.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Bloodseeker's Rage
description: As you strike, flashes of spectral teeth and blood-red hide reveal the bloodseeker drake predator spirit that inspires your rage.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Skull-Taker's Rage
description: The ancient berserker spirit that drives this rage doesn’t care that its presence tears you apart, vein by vein. It wants the skulls of your enemies, no matter how they’ ve tried to wedge themselves into their cowards’ armor.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Ambusher's Rage
description: Blood calls. The ambush drake’s throaty roar erupts from your throat as you fling yourself around your wounded enemy in a dizzying set-up for the death blow.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Carver's Raging Glory
description: Your axe rises in time with the ocean’s pounding waves. Your axe falls with power borrowed from each crashing death.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Stoneroot Rage
description: The power wells up from deep within the unassailable earth.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Whisper's Blades Rage
description: A shifting aura of moons and stars outlines your form. As blood drips from your blade and from the enemy who never saw your cut coming, you can hear the wicked laughter of the trickster spirit.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Fortune's Ravagers Rage
description: Sometimes good luck leads directly to bad, and when your foe is lucky enough to make an extraordinarily effective attack, you’re right there to slam that luck back down its throat.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Earthquake Dragon's Rage
description: The ground shakes, and the air splits. You can barely hear the voices of your friends asking you to call on a different primal spirit to drive your rage.
info: Daily Primal , Rage , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Nightmare Eruption
description: You bring forth a nightmare in your foe’s mind and project it out for its comrades to see.
info: At-Will Arcane , Illusion , Implement , Psychic Standard Action Ranged 10

name: Radiant Pillar
description: You conjure a cylinder of light that illuminates the battlefield, searing the eyes of your foes.
info: Encounter Arcane , Evocation , Implement , Radiant , Zone Standard Action Area burst 1 within 10

name: Thunderstaff
description: As your enemy comes too close, you slam the butt of your staff into the ground, sending a shockwave that knocks it off its feet and far away from you.
info: Daily Arcane , Evocation , Implement , Thunder Immediate Interrupt Melee 2

name: Able Companion
description: You conjure a creature of many hands and feet that aids your allies.
info: Daily Arcane , Conjuration Minor Action Ranged 10

name: Tome of Transposition
description: You open your tome to a page of secrets and flood your foe’s mind with them, causing its weak brain to overload.
info: Daily Arcane , Enchantment , Implement , Psychic Standard Action Ranged 20

name: Dimension Switch
description: You and your ally teleport into each other’s locations.
info: Encounter Arcane , Teleportation Move Action Close burst 10

name: Wand Coupling
description: You release a blast of energy from your wand, and as that energy flows outward, it pulses briefly and brightly with a secondary surge of magic.
info: Encounter Arcane , Evocation , Implement Standard Action Ranged 10

name: Summon Angel Wretch
description: A spectral creature composed of numerous wispy black-feathered wings, all joined together at the pinions, attacks with gouts of shadowy noxious gas.
info: Daily Arcane , Implement , Necrotic , Poison , Summoning Minor Action Ranged 20

name: Dimensional Journey
description: You take a step and reappear well away from your starting point.
info: Daily Arcane , Teleportation Move Action Personal

name: Orb of Doom
description: You create a replica of your orb around your foes, trapping them in a crystalline prison.
info: Encounter Arcane , Evocation , Implement Standard Action Area burst 3 within 20

name: Knowledge Blast
description: You hold up your tome and concentrate all your knowledge through it into a beam of pure energy, firing it at your ignorant foe.
info: Encounter Arcane , Implement , Psychic Standard Action Ranged 10

name: Steel Serpent Strike
description: You lash out with the speed of a striking serpent, hitting your foe in a vulnerable area that hinders its movement.
info: Encounter Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Librus Phantasma
description: You open your tome and your foe flows into the book, where it must navigate through an eldritch labyrinth before returning to reality.
info: Daily Arcane , Implement , Reliable Standard Action Ranged 10

name: Ritual Master
description: Your constant study has revealed the secrets of mysteries that archmages haven’t solved.
info: Daily Arcane Free Action Personal

name: Rictus Grin
description: Your features twist in a deathly grimace, striking terror in those around you.
info: Encounter Divine , Fear , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Rotting Wound
description: Putrescence weeps from the wound you bestow, rotting your enemy from the inside out.
info: Daily Divine , Necrotic , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Decaying Presence
description: Your presence decays your enemy’s defenses, allowing your prayers to strike without interference.
info: Daily Divine Minor Action Personal

name: Chains of Letherna
description: You invoke your god’s power to bind your enemy in icy chains until you can visit the divine vengeance its presence demands.
info: Encounter Cold , Divine , Implement Standard Action Ranged 5

name: Leprous Wound
description: Your dire strike causes your enemy to fall to pieces.
info: Daily Divine , Necrotic , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Raven Wings
description: Death’s shroud falls upon you, but your god intercedes and spares you from the approaching doom.
info: Daily Divine , Healing , Teleportation No Action Personal

name: Curse of Misfortune
description: Fate intervenes and consigns the enemy to defeat as its attacks fail and its stratagems lead to ruin.
info: Daily Divine , Implement , Psychic Standard Action Close burst 3

name: Seized Destiny
description: You foster courage where fear reigns, and you provide strength where weakness rules.
info: Daily Divine Standard Action Close burst 5

name: Union of Three Fates
description: Three inky tendrils emerge from your target, and those touched by the malignant appendages learn their fates, for good or ill.
info: Encounter Cold , Divine , Healing , Implement , Necrotic Standard Action Ranged 10

name: Breath of the Raven Queen
description: You release the Raven Queen’s breath to assail your enemies, binding them in black ice to leach strength from their bodies and their souls.
info: Daily Cold , Divine , Implement , Necrotic Standard Action Close blast 5

name: Death for Death
description: You pluck fate’s strings to alter the outcome of your ally’s attack.
info: Daily Divine Immediate Interrupt Ranged 5

name: Death's Denial
description: Your utterance prevents death from claiming new victims.
info: Encounter Divine , Healing , Zone Standard Action Close burst 5

name: Death's Dread Whisper
description: Your voice drops to a whisper and from your mouth issues your enemies’ undoing.
info: Encounter Divine , Implement Standard Action Close blast 5

name: Vile Plague
description: At your command, the ground releases ancient plagues once used to harvest new souls for the Lord of the Dead.
info: Daily Divine , Implement , Necrotic , Poison Standard Action Area burst 5 within 10 squares

name: Vengeful Dead
description: When your ally falls, you intone a dread word to bind its spirit to the flesh, causing the companion to rise again and fight on your behalf.
info: Daily Divine Minor Action Ranged 10

name: Age's Infirmity
description: Your command sees the enemy age rapidly, forcing time’s ravages to come crashing in if only for a moment.
info: Encounter Divine , Implement , Necrotic Standard Action Area burst 1 within 10 squares

name: Harm
description: You speed your enemy to death’s door by draining its life and vitality with one cruel command.
info: Daily Divine , Implement , Necrotic Standard Action Melee touch

name: Fortune Spurned Smite
description: Your weapon burns with dark flames. What the flames touch becomes craven and fearful, which are traits despised by fortune.
info: Encounter Divine , Fear , Necrotic , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Knockout
description: A well-placed blow takes your foe out of the fight.
info: Daily Martial , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Reaper's Harvest
description: Your weapon parts your enemy’s defenses, letting you claim the bounty of its defeat.
info: Daily Divine , Healing , Necrotic , Psychic , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: Frozen Shackles
description: Heat flees from your enemy, causing the target to freeze in place.
info: Encounter Cold , Divine , Implement Standard Action Ranged 10

name: Visage of Sorrow
description: You call forth divine power from the Shadowfell, welcoming its power to transform your aspect to one of utter sorrow and grief.
info: Daily Divine , Fear , Implement , Psychic Standard Action Close burst 2

name: Grave Smite
description: Your smite sends the enemy to the grave.
info: Encounter Divine , Necrotic , Weapon Standard Action Melee weapon

name: World in Winter
description: Cold blossoms around you, bringing ice and snow in from the Shadowfell.
info: Daily Cold , Divine , Necrotic , Weapon , Zone Standard Action Close burst 1

name: Grave Chill
description: When the dead fall, you speed their souls to the Shadowfell.
info: Encounter Divine , Implement Immediate Reaction Ranged 5

name: Call of Letherna
description: A frigid wind moans as it swirls around you, bringing with it the malign atmosphere found only in the Raven Queen’s demesne.
info: Daily Cold , Divine , Implement , Necrotic , Zone Standard Action Close burst 5
